results.content: Course is ok but definitely not a master class. Was hoping for more advanced content - specifically how to use GeneratePress to create sites that look like the Site Library.
results.content_html: Course is ok but definitely not a master class. Was hoping for more advanced content - specifically how to use GeneratePress to create sites that look like the Site Library.

results.content: It's a short course explaining all the functions of the GeneratePress theme. I'm glad I purchased the course as I now have a much better understanding of how it all works and I prefer to watch 2 hours of videos, than read through all the documentation on the GeneratePress website.

I'm glad I purchased the course as I now have a much better understanding of how it all works and I prefer to watch 2 hours of videos, than read through all the documentation on the GeneratePress website.

results.content: I bought Generate press after   a lot of  searching  for fast  themes for Wordpress and saw how they came up numerous times, after buying it I found their tutorials were kind of weak  for someone that is new at building websites. I am glad I  came across this course that shows and explains things in plain English. I also contacted the Instructor a couple times with questions and was pleasantly surprised with the fast response and support so kudos to him.

results.content: Good overview for a good start working with generatepress. Many thanks, it helps a lot and saves time.

results.content: GeneratePress is a Huge Theme. This course was a Great introduction for me to get my feet wet with the theme. Now it's time for more practice to sharpen up. Thank you!

results.content: Dieser Kurs war super. Immer wieder eine Hilfe für mich beim Erstellen meiner ersten GeneratePress-Seiten. Danke für den tollen Kurs! :)

results.content:
This course was pretty much what I hoped it would be. I would have liked some more examples of what hooks are used for. I've actually been using GeneratePress since 2017 without knowing much about what the GP Premium plugin can do. I got it mostly for all the normal customization options, especially typography and colors. The free version just didn't have enough options to make me happy. 

Not sure how I feel about the site library themes. I chose Niche, but I need a way to customize for orders besides In Stock.  Just now we're building to order.

In any case, I'm glad I checked Udemy and found the course. I'm sure I'll be referring to it often in the future.
results.content_html:

results.content: Awful presentation. No content that isn't obvious.

results.content: Great course!  I had chosen GeneratePress after looking at numerous themes,  How happy I was to find a detailed, comprehenseive course on Udemy instead random videos elsewhere.  I watched all the way through and will start again from the beginning while actually building my site.

response.content: Cheers, thanks for the great feedback Doug!  :)

results.content:
Thanks, Tom, for an enjoyable and helpful overview of GeneratePress. Your enthusiasm is contagious. 
This course is for beginners, but it does assume a little CSS and PHP knowledge. (The PHP example was totally over my head, but did not affect my enjoyment of the course.) 
I bought this course mostly in hopes of 1) getting a good overview of the theme's capabilities and 2) understanding Elements (especially headers and hooks). 
Very satisfied with goal #1. Mostly satisfied with #2. 
I would have liked more examples of Elements, and an explanation of how to style and use them. But at least students were directed where to find more documentation about hooks and other features of this amazing theme, so that's helpful. 
I do feel like I grasp the topic of hooks a bit better than before.  
Hopefully, the instructor will come back sometime and add the promised list of sites he's built with this theme so students can get even more inspiration with concrete examples.
results.content_html:
